CustomField.description: Default value for new contacts is true. When set to true the system will auto update the contact's current ask amount with the amount of the contact's last gift if the last gift amount is greater than 0.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Default value for new contacts is true. When set to true the system will auto update the contact's current ask amount with the amount of the contact's last gift if the last gift amount is greater than 0.
CustomField.label: Auto Calculate Current Ask Amount
